    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"

>
[Enduring Quickness](/Feats.aspx?ID=6048) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 127 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You move as fast and freely as the wind. You're permanently [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=89). You can use your extra action to Stride or [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298), or to provide one of the actions needed for a [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378).
name: Enduring Quickness
